name: Premier Sixes
overview: Gives you the opportunity to guide one of ten top Premiership sides to the Premier Sixes Cup. One club will ask you to take over the running of their club's squad and you have to guide them to the top. Players such as Owen, Yorke, Shearer, etc, will be at your disposal however it's up to you to pick the right team. Spread over an eighteen week period you must try and shuffle your squad around to ensure that they stay fresh for the run in. Versions of this game continued until 1999 with updated players and rosters. The exciting Championship Manager-style match sequences complement the managerial side nicely, together with enough tactical options to make the user feel he is really doing something
